divs: sighting detailsi saw a stationary yellowish\gold light hovering in the sky. it got my attention due to its size and brightness, compared to stars in the backround. i observed it moving at a slow speed to the left, then to the right from my view of it. it then stopped and zipped off to the horizon at such a speed, that i cant even estimate it accurately. it went from being still, to disappearing over the horizon, in the blink of an eye.
Summary: I saw a stationary yellowish/gold light hovering in the sky. It changed direction a couple of times and in an instant, took off at a high speed over the horizon.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Kennesaw
There were no other sightings in Kennesaw on or around November 8th 2012
